name: Chest Workout
description: Build a strong and broad chest with these fundamental exercises.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.details: 3 sets of 10-15 reps. Keep your core tight.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.details: 3 sets of 8-10 reps. Focus on controlled movement.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.details: 3 sets of 10 reps. Targets the upper chest.

exercises.name: Chest Flys
exercises.details: 3 sets of 12 reps. Feel the stretch.

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.details: 3 sets to failure. Great for lower chest and triceps.

name: Leg Exercise
description: Develop leg strength and stability with these essential moves.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.details: 3 sets of 20 reps. Keep your back straight.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.details: 3 sets of 12 reps per leg. Step wide for balance.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.details: 3 sets of 10-12 reps. Don't lock your knees.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.details: 4 sets of 15 reps. Go slow for max burn.

exercises.name: Leg Curls
exercises.details: 3 sets of 12 reps. Targets the hamstrings.

name: Biceps
description: Classic arm building exercises for peak shape.

exercises.name: Barbell Curls
exercises.details: 3 sets of 10 reps. No swinging!

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.details: 3 sets of 12 reps. Targets the brachialis.

exercises.name: Preacher Curls
exercises.details: 3 sets of 10 reps. Isolates the biceps.

exercises.name: Concentration Curls
exercises.details: 3 sets of 12 reps each arm.

exercises.name: Chin-ups
exercises.details: 3 sets to failure. Great compound move.

name: Core Muscles
description: Strengthen your midsection for better overall performance.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.details: 3 sets of 45-60 seconds. Stay flat like a board.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.details: 3 sets of 20 reps. Focus on the squeeze.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.details: 3 sets of 15 reps. Keep legs straight if possible.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.details: 3 sets of 20 reps total. Use a weight for challenge.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.details: 3 sets of 30 seconds. Elevated heart rate.

name: Back Workout
description: Build a powerful V-taper and improve posture with these back-focused movements.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.details: 3 sets to failure. Focus on pulling with your elbows, not just your hands.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Rows
exercises.details: 3 sets of 8-10 reps. Keep your back flat and pull the bar to your belly button.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.details: 3 sets of 10-12 reps. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom.

exercises.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Rows
exercises.details: 3 sets of 10 reps per side. Ensures balanced strength on both sides.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.details: 3 sets of 5-8 reps. The ultimate full-back and posterior chain builder.

name: Forearms
description: Improve grip strength and forearm size.

exercises.name: Wrist Curls
exercises.details: 3 sets of 15 reps. Palms facing up.

exercises.name: Reverse Wrist Curls
exercises.details: 3 sets of 15 reps. Palms facing down.

exercises.name: Farmer's Walk
exercises.details: 3 sets of 40 meters. Carry heavy dumbbells.

exercises.name: Wrist Rollers
exercises.details: 3 sets up and down. Incredible pump.

exercises.name: Dead Hangs
exercises.details: 3 sets of 30-45 seconds. Just hang from a bar.

name: Neck
description: Essential for athletes and posture correction.

exercises.name: Neck Isometrics
exercises.details: 3 sets of 10 seconds. Push against your hand.

exercises.name: Lying Neck Retraction
exercises.details: 3 sets of 15 reps. Tuck your chin.

exercises.name: Fron/Back Neck Extensions
exercises.details: 3 sets of 12 reps. Use weight if advanced.

exercises.name: Shoulder Shrugs
exercises.details: 4 sets of 12 reps. Targets the traps/neck.

name: Glutes
description: Build power and shape in your posterior chain.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.details: 3 sets of 20 reps. Squeeze at the top.

exercises.name: Hip Thrusts
exercises.details: 3 sets of 12 reps. The king of glute moves.

exercises.name: Cable Kickbacks
exercises.details: 3 sets of 15 reps each leg.

exercises.name: Clamshells
exercises.details: 3 sets of 20 reps each side.

exercises.name: Abductor Machine
exercises.details: 3 sets of 12 reps. Good for side glute.

name: Full Body Stretching
description: Improve flexibility and aid recovery by stretching every major muscle group.

exercises.name: Cobra Stretch
exercises.details: Hold for 30 seconds. Targets the abdominals and lower back.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.details: Hold for 45 seconds. Great for relaxing the spine and shoulders.

exercises.name: Hamstring Reach
exercises.details: Hold for 30 seconds per leg. Reach for your toes while keeping legs straight.

exercises.name: Quad Stretch
exercises.details: Hold for 30 seconds per side. Stand on one leg and pull your heel to your glute.

exercises.name: Cross-Body Shoulder Stretch
exercises.details: Hold for 30 seconds per arm. Pull one arm across your chest.

exercises.name: Triceps Stretch
exercises.details: Hold for 20 seconds per arm. Reach your hand down the center of your back.

exercises.name: Butterfly Stretch
exercises.details: Hold for 45 seconds. Targets the inner thighs and groin.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.details: 10 slow repetitions. Improves mobility in the neck and entire spine.

exercises.name: Pigeon Pose
exercises.details: Hold for 30 seconds per side. Deep stretch for the hips and glutes.

exercises.name: Neck Circles
exercises.details: 5 circles per direction. Releases tension in the upper traps and neck.
